    Core Team

    Ramesh Jain is an assistant professor at Singapore University of Technology and Design and a senior member at the DeCLaRe Lab. His research interests include natural language processing, multimodal sentiment analysis, dialogue systems.

    Read More

    Lipika Dey is a scientist at the DeCLaRe Lab, Singapore University of Technology and Design. He is doing research on conversation analysis and multimodal sentiment analysis.

    Read More
